entry.title: On My Knees, I’m Home
entry.summary:
Author: DamnSterek

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,307Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 0

Summary: Eddie’s been in love with Buck for years—but he’s good at hiding things, burying feelings, and pretending everything’s fine. Until one night, he just... can’t anymore. He blurts out that he wants to scene with Buck, and to his surprise, Buck says yes. What starts as one scene quickly spirals into something deeper, something neither of them are quite ready to admit out loud. Cue: seven years of pining, mutual idiocy, soft dom!Buck, emotionally constipated!Eddie, a whole lot of feelings, some very intense aftercare, and eventually realizing that sometimes, love sounds a lot like “Color?” and “Green.”

entry.title: best friends, ex-friends 'til the end (better off as lovers)
entry.summary:
Author: drakesword

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 43,248Chapters: 17/40Kudos: 41

Summary: A lot of things are gay at this school, Eddie has noticed. It’s not necessarily a new phenomenon, but back in elementary school, that word was only ever hushed, giggled over, never dared to be said in front of the teachers, in fear of being scolded.Here, however, it’s shouted down hallways, said out loud in classrooms, written on blackboards, thrown at the heads of kids who dare to express themselves in the wrong way.So yeah, no thanks. Eddie would rather not approach, or even look at anyone with something remotely close to a social life at this school again. He doesn’t want to make himself a target.Because if there is one thing people should know about him, it’s this: Eddie Diaz is not gay. Or; AU where Buck and Eddie meet in middle school and quickly become best friends. But as they grow up alongside each other, their dynamic evolves more and more into something Eddie is not quite ready to face.

entry.title: Wes Begins
entry.summary:
Author: BuddiefanRPNJ

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 91,896Chapters: 8/10Kudos: 130

Summary: Over the past few months, Wesley Cross and his husband, Cole, have become integral parts of the lives of Buck, Eddie, and the rest of the 118. After uncovering that the bridge collapse was no accident, the 118 and their allies are on high alert, knowing that it's only a matter of time before disaster strikes again. Wes is consumed by guilt, convinced that his very presence is endangering his friends. But the time has come to reveal the truth to his new family, for the keys to defeating their new enemy may be entangled with his tragic past. As Wes plunges into the depths of his most traumatic memories, the shocking revelations might just reveal surprising connections between him and other members of the 118.

entry.title: Westbound
entry.summary:
Author: MidnightDraft

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,923Chapters: 8/18Kudos: 5

Summary: Set directly after the season 8 finale of 9-1-1, Buck moves to Santa Monica while Eddie stays behind with Christopher. But some truths don’t fade with distance. In a string of quiet moments, they’re forced to confront what’s always been there.Part 1: Buck struggles to find the courage to tell Eddie what Bobby’s death has made impossible to ignore.Part 2: Eddie begins to realize he can’t and doesn’t want to live without Buck.

entry.title: War Of Hearts
entry.summary:
Author: miladystark

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,240Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 36

Summary: Lieutenant Commander Evan Buckley has survived war zones, covert missions, and enough explosions to fill a lifetime—but nothing prepared him for Staff Sergeant Eddie Diaz, the army medic with a sharp tongue and zero regard for rank.They clash, they fight, they bleed—and somewhere between they start to fall. Slowly. Stupidly. Against all odds. Because in a world where every second counts, love is the one thing they never trained for. Sergeant Eddie Diaz didn’t look up until he heard boots and yelling.“Careful!” he said, deadpan, as the team deposited Buck—still resisting—onto the cot. “We wouldn’t want to bruise his ego any further.”“You’re the medic?” Buck growled, glaring up at the man with messy curls and sharp eyes.“No,” Eddie replied dryly, pulling on gloves. “I’m the fairy godmother. You got a wish?”

entry.title: Phoenix from the ashes
entry.summary:
Author: Ficalicious

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 42,071Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 350

Summary: All in all, Buck was feeling great about his return to the 118.He had earned his life back.Spencer had been right, the decision to take his leg had been the right one in the end he knew, he had no regrets. And the team had welcomed him back, Bobby especially despite the fact that during the first few shifts the man had looked more than a little tense, his eyes constantly straying back to Buck as if he was terrified something would go wrong and he’d get hurt again....Buck is back where he belongs. entry.title: Hunger for you
entry.summary:
Author: LunaDusktreader

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,395Chapters: 9/13Kudos: 9

Summary: Buck has always known that the chemistry between him and Eddie was undeniable, but he never imagined that a simple moment of care could ignite such intense and forbidden desire. When Eddie begins to deal with the unexpected effects of lactation, the discomfort quickly turns into something new – a need that awakens unfamiliar sensations.At first, it is just an innocent touch, a gesture of support. But when Buck notices the way Eddie reacts, their gazes linger, their touches become more lingering, and the tension between them becomes impossible to ignore. Between hesitant whispers and bodies seeking each other, they discover a shared pleasure that scares and excites them in equal measure.What began as a moment of vulnerability turns into an explosion of desire and connection. But are they ready to accept what this means for the relationship they have built? Between surrender and uncertainty, Buck and Eddie will discover that, sometimes, hunger goes far beyond what can be controlled.

entry.title: No puedo quererte(WIP)
entry.summary:
Author: Sunsun333

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 287Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 0

Summary: After Shannon had passed, Eddie couldn’t love anyone else like he loved her until he realized he had fallen for his best friend Evan ‘Buck’ Buckley. Realizing his feelings for Buck, he decided not to tell anyone because he's afraid of hurting Buck like he did with Shannon and doesn’t want to destroy or cause issues in their relationship which includes Chrisropher who cherishes and loves Buck. Years later, on a random Friday night out in the big 2025 with Buck and Eddie, Buck confesses that he's in love with Eddie out of nowhere while being drunk, and surprise, surprise, Eddie wasn’t drunk. So Eddie starts avoiding Buck, not knowing that buck remembered what he had said that night.

entry.title: Things That Go Bump In The Night
entry.summary:
Author: WellHelloHello

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,480Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 9

Summary: The next time she woke up she was lying on a solid floor, if the chill was anything to go by she’d assume it was concrete.She didn’t open her eyes yet, choosing to take stock of everything first.Her feet felt weirdly light and cold, ah, she didn’t have any shoes or socks on, that would do it, and she was missing her shirt, thankfully her top was still on though. Small blessings. Her hands and ankles were still tied, and there was something shoved in her mouth and tied at the back of her head. She was, however, injury free, which made her feel more unsettled than it probably should have, if they weren’t going to beat her up or hurt her why had they bothered taking her? Jesus, her brain was too cloudy to figure anything out.She eventually blinked her eyes open and shook her head to get her hair out of her face, but she could’ve sworn she’d had it up in braids earlier? Then again she’d also been wearing shoes and a shirt earlier.“Good to see you awake.” A voice said, making her look up, “Hello Ms Grant-Nash.” Jeffery fucking Hudson, shit!orTo get back at Athena Jeffery Hudson takes Buck, the fall out is devastating.

entry.title: I Didn’t Mean to Be Something I’m Not Supposed To, but I Am. I Am.
entry.summary:
Author: schrijverr

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,935Chapters: 3/23Kudos: 151

Summary: After everything Buck and Eddie have gone through together, the marriage that was once just convenience is now real. They’re boyfriend-husbands, trying to figure out what their life looks like now that they’re dating and learning to be an actual couple.However, trouble arises with the promised trip back home to El Paso for the summer. Eddie is not ready to come out to his parents and Buck supports him in that. Still, El Paso is not the place where either of them have been their best and tensions arise between them when having to exist in the influence sphere of the Diaz parents. Everything that has happened between them catches up as personal histories, insecurities and unresolved issues float back up to the surface.AKA: The terrible, horrible, no good, very bad El Paso trip.

entry.title: false alarm
entry.summary:
Author: nightnightbutterfly

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 26,560Chapters: 5/5Kudos: 5

Summary: the 118 begins the painstakingly tasks of grieving bobby nash. they participate in the five stages of grief and although no two experiences are the same they begin to see just how familiar it is to love and be loved and miss the love once shared.In my personal opinion, 8x16- The Last Alarm, was such a disservice to Bobby Nash, his legacy somehow stained by the lack of storytelling. I am so deeply saddened by the rushed writing, confused acting, and incoherent world building. So I have taken it upon myself to make this.Not perfect by any standards, but from my brain to your eyeballs-- enjoy.

entry.title: Just You and Me Against the Tides (Babe Nothing can get in our Way)
entry.summary:
Author: Major_Moments

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 20,692Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 5

Summary: Evan Buckley wouldn’t believe you if you told him that the most peaceful place he’d ever be in was at home, in his district. If you asked, he’d tell you that it’s a violent place where children train for the hunger games, and that it’s encouraged to volunteer, just for the slim chance that you’ll even make it out alive.Risking your life just for a little bit of honor.

entry.title: Jumping in heart first
entry.summary:
Author: SavSmiles22

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 22,083Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 172

Summary: This has been a rollercoaster of a year for Buck. Get broken up with, sister gets kidnapped, best friend moves away, move into his house, everyone thinks your in love with your straight best friend, almost lose your whole team in a explosion, lose the only father figure you’ve ever had, best friend abruptly moves back, and lastly move into a new place again. So of course the cherry on top comes via phone call or should I say olive on top because apparently that’s his daughter’s name.
